remarks: ~ tfr2 via well-founded recursion.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 22-Apr-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
tfrALT.1 $e |- F = recs ( G ) $.
tfr2ALT $p |- ( z e. On -> ( F ` z ) = ( G ` ( F |` z ) ) ) $.
